scripts.generate-stubs: npm run sync-protos && rm -rf ./generated && mkdir -p ./generated && npx grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --ts_out=service=grpc-js,mode=grpc-js:./generated --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./generated --grpc_out=grpc_js:./generated -I ./protos $(find ./protos -name '*.proto')
scripts.test: npm run generate-stubs && npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed: npm run generate-stubs && npx playwright test --headed
